resources.string: Choose a number from 0 to 9 corresponding to the desired sensor data: (0: mag_x, 1: mag_y, 2: mag_z, 3: mag_h, 4: acc_x, 5: acc_y, 6: acc_z, 7: gyro_x, 8: gyro_y, 9: gyro_z)
Choose a number between 0 and 1 corresponding to your sex: (0:female, 1: male)
Align trajectory to world coordinates with desired sensor values:
Do you wish the sensor values to be overlaid as well? (0: no, 1: yes):
